page.description: The FILE.FROM_BLOB() method creates a file from binary data.
page.syntax: Byte_Count as N = From_blob(C Filename,B data)

argument.name: Filename
argument.description: The path and name of the file to create.

page.example: dim cc as C dim bb as B cc = file.to_string("C:\Garden\achillea.bmp") bb = char_to_blob(cc) file.from_blob("c:\temp\flower.bmp", bb)
